properties.title: Installing Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus

section.name: Installing Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus Plugin

subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: Make sure you have the forge Maven2 repository reference and dependency definition in the root pom.xml of your project.

div.source:
<repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<repository> <id>hippo-maven2-forge</id> <name>Hippo Maven 2 Forge repository</name> <url>http://maven.onehippo.com/maven2-forge/</url> <snapshots /> </repository>
<!-- SNIP -->
</repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.folderctxmenus.version' to a version of this plugin! -->
<dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.folderctxmenus</groupId> <artifactId>folderctxmenus-repository</artifactId> <version>${forge.folderctxmenus.version}</version> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.folderctxmenus</groupId> <artifactId>folderctxmenus-frontend</artifactId> <version>${forge.folderctxmenus.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your Hippo CMS Web Application module subproject.
Now, you're ready to use the plugin!

section.name: Installing Only the Common module of Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus Plugin

subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: If you want to use only Programmatic Folder Copy and Move, then you may add the following dependency only.

div.source:
<repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<repository> <id>hippo-maven2-forge</id> <name>Hippo Maven 2 Forge repository</name> <url>http://maven.onehippo.com/maven2-forge/</url> <snapshots /> </repository>
<!-- SNIP -->
</repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.folderctxmenus.version' to a version of this plugin! -->
<dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.folderctxmenus</groupId> <artifactId>folderctxmenus-common</artifactId> <version>${forge.folderctxmenus.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your Web Application module subproject(s).
Now, you're ready to use the common module of the plugin!
